00020     public class Map : GameState
00021     {

00023         internal HeroPlaneObj hero;

00037         public string TargetShooting = "";

00043         #region Constructor and Init
00044         public Map(String title, String objective, Texture2D background, SoundEffect BGM, float scrollSpeed, Dictionary<string, EnemyPlaneObj> enemyPlaneObjs, Dictionary<string, Obj> objs, HeroPlaneObj hero, List<Event> events)

00057         protected override void Initialize()
00058         {
00059             toBeRemoved = new List<string>();
00060             bulletPool = new List<BulletObj>();
00061             scrollUpdateTimer = new TimeSpan();
00062             fpsTimer = new TimeSpan();
00063             events = new List<Event>();
00064             enemiessToBeUpdated = new List<PlaneObj>();
00065         }

00076         #region Update and Draw
00077         internal override void Update(GameTime gameTime)
00078         {
00079             NeedUpdate = true;
00080             NeedDraw = true;
00081             hero.Update(this, gameTime);
00082 
00083             scrollUpdateTimer += gameTime.ElapsedGameTime;
00084             fpsTimer += gameTime.ElapsedGameTime;
00085             gameElapsedTimer += gameTime.ElapsedGameTime;
00086 
00087             MSG2 = bulletPool.Count + "";
00088 
00089             /* calcs fps */
00090             if (fpsTimer >= TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(1000))
00091             {
00092                 FPS = frameCounter;
00093                 frameCounter = 0;
00094                 fpsTimer -= TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(1000);
00095             }
00096 
00097             /* adds the obj to be updated as the time goes */
00098             if (events.Count > 0) {
00099                 for (int i = events.Count - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00100                 {
00101                     if (events[i].Milliseconds < gameElapsedTimer.TotalMilliseconds)
00102                     {
00103                         enemiessToBeUpdated.Add( new EnemyPlaneObj(enemyPlaneObjs[events[i].Obj]) );
00104                         events.RemoveAt(i);
00105                     }
00106                 }
00107             }
00108 
00109             /* updates the enempy plane objs */
00110             if (enemiessToBeUpdated.Count > 0)
00111             {
00112                 if (scrollUpdateTimer.TotalMilliseconds > 75)
00113                 {
00114                     /* moves the enemy down if scollspeed is specified */
00115                     for (int i = enemiessToBeUpdated.Count - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00116                         enemiessToBeUpdated[i].move(0.0f, scrollSpeed, enemiessToBeUpdated[i].velocity);
00117                     scrollUpdateTimer -= TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(75);
00118                 }
00119 
00120                 for (int i = enemiessToBeUpdated.Count - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00121                     enemiessToBeUpdated[i].Update(this, gameTime);
00122             }
00123 
00124             /* Calling update on all of the bullets, foreach will cause a problem if the item is removed */
00125             for (int i = bulletPool.Count - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00126                 bulletPool[i].Update(bulletPool, this, gameTime);
00127 
00128             /* Can only use foreach loop because that is the only way to iterate through dictionaries */
00129             foreach (string objID in toBeRemoved)
00130             {
00131                 //if (enemiessToBeUpdated.Remove(objID)) continue;
00132                 if (objs.Remove(objID)) continue;
00133                 else if (hero.visibility == false)
00134                 {
00135                     _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.activate(new Dialog("Game Over", "Please Restart", new Vector2(_GLOBAL.Viewport.Width / 2, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height / 2)));
00136                     NeedUpdate = false;
00137                 }
00138             }
00139             toBeRemoved.Clear();
00140         }
00141 
00142         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00143         {
00144             frameCounter++;
00145             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteBlendMode.AlphaBlend);
00146             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(background, _GLOBAL.ViewportRect, Color.White);
00147             foreach (Obj obj in objs.Values)
00148                 obj.Draw(gameTime);
00149 
00150             foreach (EnemyPlaneObj obj in enemiessToBeUpdated)
00151                 obj.Draw(gameTime);
00152 
00153             foreach (BulletObj bullet in bulletPool)
00154                 bullet.Draw(gameTime);
00155 
00156             hero.Draw(gameTime);
00157 
00158             /* Debug messages */
00159             if (_GLOBAL.Debug)
00160             {
00161                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, TargetShooting, new Vector2(500, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height - _GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString("\n\n\n\n").Y - 400), Color.White);
00162                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, "Bullets: " + MSG2, new Vector2(10, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height - _GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString(" ").Y * (enemiessToBeUpdated.Count + 1)), Color.White);
00163                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, "Fps: " + FPS, new Vector2(_GLOBAL.Viewport.Width - _GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString("FPS: 60").X, 10), Color.White);
00164             }
00165             
00166             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.End();
00167         }
00168         #endregion
00169     }
